_header: Failing of friendship oft time we find
_description: ‘On the Evils of Covetousness’ — seventy-five quatrains

TokyoTak15.First Lines:
Fayling off frenshippe offt tyme we fyndeIn oure lyues and when we
                    be dedeÞof al þi kynne faile þe & hald þe
                    behyndeTrist holly in god þis is my best rede…
TokyoTak15.Last Lines:
…And to þi mercy þou us takeWhen we oute of þis
                    world shal wende Amen. Explicit
